name: Road Under Construction HD
description:
In 2011, the world was coming to an end in Southern California. The overly crowded 405 Freeway was scheduled to be shut down for a full weekend due to a massive construction project. It was predicted that this road closure would bring the entire LA Metropolitan transportation system to its knees. The media organized a massive public information campaign and informed everyone living in Southern California that a 10 mile section of the freeway would be completely closed. As seen by the live aerial coverage of the closure almost everyone was off the 405 Freeway during this time.

However, you and your friends in a rush somehow avoided the thousands of hours of public notices and came upon a CLOSED FOR CONSTRUCTION sign. You and your friends ignored the sign and decided to take a shortcut through the once in a lifetime EMPTY 405 Freeway.

RACING GAME FEATURES:
-23 different vehicles- sports cars and even buses
-Career mode to earn money and purchase new vehicles
-Fully upgradeable cars
-Realistic car physics with drifting and traction control
-Multiple race modes- Typical Race, Duel, and Elimination
-Game Center Leaderboards
-In App Purchases available to quickly upgrade cars

For More Information Visit: emersonapps.com
Please Rate for updates with more tracks
